body.name: Fisher-Price Laugh & Learn Baby Learning Toy Smart Stages Piggy Bank with Songs Sounds and Phrases for Infant to Toddler Play
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 42 mins
features: Interactive toy piggy bank with 40+ songs, sounds and learning phrases for infants and toddlers ages 6-36 months
2 Smart Stages levels teach numbers and counting, colors, and Spanish words
Drop the coins into piggy’s back or press the nose for fun songs, sounds and phrases
Includes 10 colorful coins with numbers or animals on each side for put-and-take play
Item arrives in frustration-free, easy-to-open packaging that’s 100% recyclable.
body.description: The Laugh & Learn Smart Stages Piggy Bank introduces your baby to counting, colors, Spanish words and more through music, silly sounds and phrases. With 10 colorful coins to drop into the Piggy Bank’s back, and a door for put-and-take play, there’s so much for your little banker to explore. Put coins in, take them out, press the silly piggy’s snout – your baby will be giggling all the way to the bank! And with 2 Smart Stages levels of play, the learning fun grows along with your baby.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Learning fun you can count on Tiny bankers will love dropping their coins in, taking them out, and pressing the little piggy’s snout to hear fun songs and sounds that introduce numbers, Spanish words, and more.
Exciting put-and-take play This toy piggy bank comes with 10 colorful coins for little ones to drop and “save” in the bank. Open the side door to empty the coins and start the fun all over again!

This toy helps teach & develop: Numbers & Counting Colors Spanish Words Hand-Eye Coordination Cause & Effect ​ Switch up the learning as they grow Level 1 – Explore (6M+): Fun phrases and sounds spark your baby’s curiosity as they drop coins through the slot, open the put-and-take door, or press on piggy’s nose. Level 2 – Encourage (12M+): This level expands on your toddler’s learning with fun questions, engaging prompts, and bilingual counting fun in English and Spanish!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for 1 yr old
reviews.reviewText: This item wasn’t prime so it took a while to arrive, but arrived sooner than their estimated date. Bought it for my baby’s first birthday. He loves trying to figure out how to put the coins in. Mostly he loves pressing the nose and hearing songs he can dance to. The toy is all brightly colored and seems to be well made. The door on it to get coins out is easy enough for my baby to open and close. My only dislike is that half the coins are one size and their other half a just barely smaller. Not really noticeable visually, but when I pick them up, it’s annoying some are smaller. It would have been fun to have the different colors be different sizes. Mostly this is just an annoyance to me, my baby couldn’t care less. It is also so awkward to pick up as an adult. I have small hands so picking it up one handed is just not an option, but even my husband who has large hands says it’s awkward to pick up. We love the toy, it’s not too loud! It doesn’t have any volume options so the sound level it comes with it perfect to me. I love that it teaches fine motor skills as well. A great educational toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for toddler!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my 13 month old for Christmas and he loves this toy he plays with it for long periods of time and it is great for fine motor skills and problem solving. It’s a great price for such a durable and fun toy, it sings and talks and counts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun and engaging!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun and educational toy. Good size and “coins” are easy to manipulate! Coins have numbers on them and the pig will count when they are pushed through the slot. English and Spanish option. The nose is soft and you can push it for various sounds and phrases. Fun way to start learning how to count and helps develop coordination when picking up the coins and putting them through the slot. — All the coins will fit in the pig for storage. Cute and fun grow with me toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great teaching toy!
reviews.reviewText: We are so pleased with this! It’s cute, durable, and our grandchild loves it.. I find myself playing with it too. Well made and the price is good too. I especially like that the coins are pnough that we don’t have to worry about choking plus the tunes are great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great learning toy
reviews.reviewText: This toy is so fun! You drop the coins in and it counts for you. Then has a cute little door on the side to unload the coins and do it again! Such a fun little activity and works on child skills!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a super fun gift! Children love it. So fun to give a colorful, delightful toy. This toy teaches so many things and is so lovely. It came with batteries. I was a bit scared of some reviews so I opened it before giving it as a gift. It was perfect and undisturbed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My 15 month old likes it!
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching g for a simple toy for my 15 month old.Criteria: Something that would entertain him, provide practice with fine motor skills, and would grow with him developmentally. My son is rough with everything, so another requirement was durability. Things that I wanted to avoid: Anything that was too complicated, came with too many pieces, took up too much space, or required a lot of assistance.Did this toy meet all of my demands?For the most part, yes.Pros: Simple, helps develop fine motor skills, is easy to use, doesn't require additional storage for the coins (they are stored inside of the piggy), talks (counts, sings songs, says phrases), has 2 levels that grow with your baby as they develop, is cute, and doesn't require much assistance.Cons: Tips over easily, slides away while my son attempted to put the coins in the slot. There is no volume control (that I'm aware of).It's a great toy, worth the price, and is cute. I would rate this toy an 8 out of 10. :)At first, he wasn't able to put the coins in the slot. After about 5 or 6 minutes of trying (I demonstrated and assisted him a few times) he figured it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great educational toy
reviews.reviewText: I bought one of these for my daughter because they use it in her speech and occupational therapy and I remember it was also a favorite toy of my oldest daughter when she was younger. A great gift and love that it's educational and can be used to encourage speech.
Granddaughter loves her new toy. She's a year old and spends quite a bit of time playing with it. Very well made.

reviews.reviewerName: No son como las de la ilustración, tienen una dura forma amorfa y son de muy mala calidad.
reviews.reviewTitle: Lo que me pidieron para ingresar a la guardería
reviews.reviewText: Difícil de conseguir, pero se logró, a un precio excesivo, pero como lo necesitaba, lo tuve que pagar.

The media could not be loaded. Quality is good. Keeps my 1 year old baby engaged for a decent amount of time (which a big deal for me as a parent).Has 2 levels of learning mode (English and Spanish).Only drawback is volume level can't be adjusted.

This pig has brought so much joy to our little one. He loves posting the coins and dancing to the song and counting along with it.Great quality product. Very educational.Very quick postage.Highly recommend this pig
This is a great learning toy. My 18 mth old started putting the coins in immediately and loved it....easy to use for her.french and English
